ingredients.name: Ingredients
ingredients.tooltip: Select ingredients to include in your dish. We'll tailor the dish to your preference.

allergens.name: Allergens
allergens.tooltip: Select allergens to exclude from your dishes. This helps in preventing allergic reactions.

gluten.name: Gluten
gluten.description: Includes foods that contain gluten, such as most cereals, breads, and pastas.

fish.name: Fish
fish.description: Covers all types of fish. Important for people with fish allergies.

crustaceans.name: Crustaceans
crustaceans.description: Includes shrimp, crabs, lobster, and other crustaceans.

eggs.name: Eggs
eggs.description: Present in many dishes and baked products, egg allergy is common.

soy.name: Soy
soy.description: Frequently used in processed products and sauces.

peanuts.name: Peanuts
peanuts.description: Common allergen that can cause severe reactions.

tree_nuts.name: Tree Nuts
tree_nuts.description: Includes almonds, hazelnuts, walnuts, cashews, pistachios, macadamia nuts, and Brazil nuts.

dairy.name: Dairy
dairy.description: Includes milk and dairy products such as cheese, butter, and yogurt.

mustard.name: Mustard
mustard.description: Commonly used in sauces and dressings.

celery.name: Celery
celery.description: Includes both fresh celery and derivatives used in processed foods.

sulfites.name: Sulfites
sulfites.description: Commonly used as preservatives in foods and drinks.

sesame.name: Sesame
sesame.description: Can be found in breads, cookies, and tahini products.

lupin.name: Lupin
lupin.description: Often used in flours and some processed meats.

molluscs.name: Molluscs
molluscs.description: Includes snails, clams, oysters, and mussels.

spicy.name: Spicy
spicy.description: Foods containing spices or peppers that provide a spicy flavor.

dishes.name: Dishes
dishes.tooltip: Browse through our variety of dishes.

category.name: Categories
category.tooltip: Select a category to view the dishes available.

pizzas.name: Pizzas
pizzas.description: Deliciously handcrafted pizzas baked to perfection with fresh ingredients and a variety of toppings to choose from.

pastas.name: Pasta
pastas.description: Explore our range of classic and contemporary pasta dishes, each prepared with fresh pasta and the finest sauces.

extras.name: Extras
extras.description: Add the perfect complement to your meal with our selection of extras, including breadsticks, sauces, and more.

desserts.name: Desserts
desserts.description: Indulge in our decadent desserts, a perfect way to conclude your meal. Choose from our selection of cakes, pastries, and ice creams.

drinks.name: Drinks
drinks.description: Quench your thirst with our assortment of beverages. From hot coffees to refreshing cocktails, we have drinks to suit all tastes.
